meanings.definition: Showing a strong interest in the arts
meanings.sent1: She is very artsier and loves visiting museums.
meanings.sent2: The artsier students always excel in their painting classes.
meanings.sent3: His artsier side comes out when he listens to classical music.
meanings.sent4: Her artsier approach to interior design transformed the space.
meanings.sent5: The artsier atmosphere of the gallery inspired her to create new artwork.

meanings.definition: More artistic or creative than others
meanings.sent1: The artsier paintings in the exhibit caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She has an artsier style of writing that captivates readers.
meanings.sent3: His artsier ideas for the project impressed the team.
meanings.sent4: The artsier costumes in the play added a magical touch.
meanings.sent5: Her artsier imagination led to unique and beautiful creations.
